long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with our cutting-edge Chrome extension designed to seamlessly integrate with Google Sheets! This powerful tool eliminates the hassle of switching between browser tabs and spreadsheets—a common productivity killer. Instead, it creates a dynamic form directly from the headers in the first row of your Google Sheets, accessible right from the website you're working on.

With just a few clicks, you can select the specific spreadsheet and sheet you want to work with. The extension will automatically generate a form based on the headers in your chosen sheet, allowing you to enter data effortlessly. No more copying and pasting; simply start populating data, and it will be neatly organized in the correct columns and rows.

One of the standout features is the ability to right-click on any webpage data and send it directly to specific columns in your Google Sheets, making data entry faster and more intuitive than ever before. Plus, your data's security is our top priority. All operations happen within your Chrome browser and Google Drive—no data, spreadsheet names, or lists are sent to any server, ensuring that your information remains private and secure.

How to use:
================
Install the extension.
Navigate to your desired webpage.
Click on the extension to open it.
Log in with your Google account.
Select your spreadsheet and the specific sheet.
Ensure your sheet has headers in the first row.
The form will auto-create based on your headers.
Start populating data—it will be automatically organized in the right format.
Experience a seamless, secure, and efficient way to manage your Google Sheets data directly from any webpage. Try our Chrome extension today and see the difference in your workflow!
